chunk:
Dead Sea Warehouse Amazing Minerals Face & Body Care Mud Mask

Brand: Dead Sea Warehouse

Category: Mask
book: 2904-Dead Sea Warehouse Amazing Minerals Face & Body Care Mud Mask

chunk: Ingredients: Salt (Dead Sea Black Mud), Glycerin, Gum Arabic, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dead Sea Mineral Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Squalane, Lonicera Japonica (Japanese Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Tocopherol (mixed),
book: 2904-Dead Sea Warehouse Amazing Minerals Face & Body Care Mud Mask

chunk: Triglyceride, Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Squalane, Lonicera Japonica (Japanese Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Tocopherol (mixed), Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene.
book: 2904-Dead Sea Warehouse Amazing Minerals Face & Body Care Mud Mask

chunk:
Directions: Apply evenly to slightly moist face, body, hair, and/or scalp. Enjoy 3 to 7 minutes only. Rinse off with lukewarm water. When treating hair with mud shampoo out. Dry skin: 1 to 2 times per week, Oily Skin: 2 to 3 times per week.

Warnings: For External Use Only, Avoid contact with eyes
book: 2904-Dead Sea Warehouse Amazing Minerals Face & Body Care Mud Mask

chunk:
Warnings: For External Use Only, Avoid contact with eyes
